snippet: L. Dennis Kozlowski, the former Tyco International chief executive, will be eligible for parole again in September of next year, according to a spokesman for the New York state corrections department.
abstract: L. Dennis Kozlowski, the former Tyco International chief executive, will be eligible for parole again in September of next year, according to a spokesman for the New York state corrections department.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Kozlowski Is Turned Down for Parole
